bean.description: ContentDocumentLinkExtract job gets import instance info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: SELECT ContentDocumentId, LinkedEntityId FROM ContentDocumentLink where LinkedEntityId in ( SELECT Id FROM c501npo__Import_Instance__c WHERE c501npo__Status__c = 'Scheduled' ) and LinkedEntity.Type='c501npo__Import_Instance__c'

bean.description: ContentVersionExtract job gets import instance info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: SELECT ContentDocumentId, Title, VersionData, FileExtension FROM ContentVersion WHERE IsLatest = True AND FileExtension != 'snote' AND c501npo__Is_Scheduled_For_Import__c = True

bean.description: ImportInstanceExtract job gets import instance info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: Select Id, c501npo__Status__c, c501npo__Type__c, c501npo__Frequency__c, c501npo__Schedule_Time__c, c501npo__Required_Import_Files__c, c501npo__Email_Attach_Logs__c FROM c501npo__Import_Instance__c WHERE c501npo__Status__c = 'Scheduled'

bean.description: ContactExtract job gets contact info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: Select Id, FirstName, LastName, ii_Primary_Contact__c, ii_Substitute_Pool_Status__c, C501_Cpr_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, C501_First_Aid_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, C501_Food_Handler_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, C501_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, C501_PBC_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, PREPARE_Cohort__c, C501_Certs_Expiring_Message__c, PREPARE_Class__c, RecordTypeId, ii_AM_Campus_User_Upload__c, ii_Member_ID__c, ii_SSPS_Number__c, ii_FamLink_Id__c, ii_Stars_Id__c, Email, Phone, ii_AM_Upload__c, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, ii_County__c, ii_Facility_Name__c, ii_Sub_Pool_Status__c, ii_Languages__c, ii_Employer_Name__c, ii_Licensed__c, ii_Unit_Status__c, Imagine_Mobile_Phone__c, ii_SSPS_Number_Matching__c, ii_Stars_Id_Matching__c, ii_License_Number__c FROM Contact WHERE RecordType.Name = 'Contact'

bean.description: FacilityExtract job gets facility contact info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: Select Id, FirstName, LastName, ii_Primary_Contact__c, ii_Substitute_Pool_Status__c, C501_Cpr_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, C501_First_Aid_Cert_Days_Remaining__c, C501_Food_Handler_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, C501_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, C501_PBC_Cert_Remaining_Days__c, PREPARE_Cohort__c, C501_Certs_Expiring_Message__c, PREPARE_Class__c, RecordTypeId, ii_AM_Campus_User_Upload__c, ii_Member_ID__c, ii_SSPS_Number__c, ii_FamLink_Id__c, ii_Stars_Id__c, Email, Phone, ii_AM_Upload__c, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, ii_County__c, ii_Facility_Name__c, ii_Sub_Pool_Status__c, ii_Languages__c, ii_Employer_Name__c, ii_Licensed__c, ii_Unit_Status__c, Imagine_Mobile_Phone__c, ii_SSPS_Number_Matching__c, ii_Stars_Id_Matching__c, ii_License_Number__c FROM Contact WHERE RecordType.Name = 'Facility'

bean.description: ContactSyncExtract job gets contact info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: Select Id, FirstName, LastName, ii_Primary_Contact__c, ii_Substitute_Pool_Status__c, RecordTypeId, ii_Member_ID__c, ii_SSPS_Number__c, ii_FamLink_Id__c, ii_Stars_Id__c, Email, MobilePhone, Phone, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, ii_County__c, ii_Facility_Name__c, ii_Sub_Pool_Status__c, ii_Languages__c, ii_Employer_Name__c, ii_Licensed__c, ii_Unit_Status__c, Imagine_Mobile_Phone__c, HomePhone, OtherPhone, npe01__WorkPhone__c, C501_SMS_Opt_Out__c, npe01__Preferred_Email__c, npe01__PreferredPhone__c, Imagine_Email__c, npe01__HomeEmail__c, HasOptedOutOfEmail, npe01__WorkEmail__c, npe01__AlternateEmail__c, ii_SSPS_Number_Matching__c, ii_Stars_Id_Matching__c, ii_License_Number__c, ii_Hiv_Cert_Date__c, ii_Tb_Cert_Status__c, ii_Orientation_Incomplete_Reason__c, ii_PBC_Expiration__c, ii_Cpr_Cert_Status__c, ii_First_Aid_Cert_Date__c, ii_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Status__c, ii_First_Aid_Cert_Status__c, ii_Annual_Continuing_Education_Training__c, ii_Initial_Training_Req_Completed_Year__c, ii_Child_Abuse_Cert_Status__c, ii_Food_Handler_Cert_Status__c, ii_Initial_Training_Requirement__c, ii_Cpr_Cert_Date__c, ii_Food_Handler_Cert_Date__c, ii_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Date__c, ii_Not_Approved_Reasons__c, ii_Orientation_Date__c, ii_Participation_Status__c, ii_Hiv_Cert_Status__c, ii_Orientation_Status__c, ii_Age__c, ii_Child_Abuse_Cert_Date__c, C501_Previous_Unit_Status__c, C501_Last_Unit_Status_Change_Date__c, Outreach_Area__c FROM Contact WHERE RecordType.Name = 'Contact'

bean.description: FacilitySyncExtract job gets facility contact info from salesforce and saves info into a CSV file.

entry.value: Select Id, FirstName, LastName, ii_Primary_Contact__c, ii_Substitute_Pool_Status__c, RecordTypeId, ii_Member_ID__c, ii_SSPS_Number__c, ii_FamLink_Id__c, ii_Stars_Id__c, Email, MobilePhone, Phone, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, ii_County__c, ii_Facility_Name__c, ii_Sub_Pool_Status__c, ii_Languages__c, ii_Employer_Name__c, ii_Licensed__c, ii_Unit_Status__c, Imagine_Mobile_Phone__c, HomePhone, OtherPhone, npe01__WorkPhone__c, C501_SMS_Opt_Out__c, npe01__Preferred_Email__c, npe01__PreferredPhone__c, Imagine_Email__c, npe01__HomeEmail__c, HasOptedOutOfEmail, npe01__WorkEmail__c, npe01__AlternateEmail__c, ii_SSPS_Number_Matching__c, ii_Stars_Id_Matching__c, ii_License_Number__c, ii_Hiv_Cert_Date__c, ii_Tb_Cert_Status__c, ii_Orientation_Incomplete_Reason__c, ii_PBC_Expiration__c, ii_Cpr_Cert_Status__c, ii_First_Aid_Cert_Date__c, ii_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Status__c, ii_First_Aid_Cert_Status__c, ii_Annual_Continuing_Education_Training__c, ii_Initial_Training_Req_Completed_Year__c, ii_Child_Abuse_Cert_Status__c, ii_Food_Handler_Cert_Status__c, ii_Initial_Training_Requirement__c, ii_Cpr_Cert_Date__c, ii_Food_Handler_Cert_Date__c, ii_Safe_Sleep_Cert_Date__c, ii_Not_Approved_Reasons__c, ii_Orientation_Date__c, ii_Participation_Status__c, ii_Hiv_Cert_Status__c, ii_Orientation_Status__c, ii_Age__c, ii_Child_Abuse_Cert_Date__c, C501_Previous_Unit_Status__c, C501_Last_Unit_Status_Change_Date__c, ii_License_Status__c, ii_Serving_Children_On_Subsidy__c, ii_Early_Achievers_Participation_Status__c, Outreach_Area__c FROM Contact WHERE RecordType.Name = 'Facility'
